sub_title: Fractional CMO/Head of Marketing/Head of PR and AR/Senior Consultant-with Successful Exits for VCs and Startups
summary:
With over 20 years of experience, I work with companies to achieve their short- and long-term business goals using digital marketing programs that leverage the power of the media, industry analysts and influencers - globally.

My history includes enabling B2B and B2C technology companies to successfully launch new products and service offerings, attract strategic partners and develop strategic alliances, increase brand equity, bolster sales, obtain funding, achieve a successful M&A or IPO, as well as develop, manage and recover a company's valuable reputation. 

Looking at an integrated marketing communications approach, my skills include:
-PR and Thought Leadership: Contributing to the US sales pipeline for European and LATAM companies
-Community Relations: Guiding tech companies through localized efforts (US, Europe and LATAM)
-Global Strategy and Crisis Management (internal and external programs) 
-Brand Building/Reputation Management
-Social Media/Blogging Writing and Strategy
-PR and Marketing Collateral and Content Development 
-Speakers' Bureaus
-Events/Conferences 
-Awards Programs
-Global PR (working with global partner firms and international media)
-Training for Sales to Leverage PR
-Website Strategy (educating media, analysts, employees and customers)
-Cause Marketing (bringing together companies with non-profits)

ASK ME ABOUT MY FOOD BACKGROUND!
I started reviewing restaurants while at UC Santa Barbara.  This interest put me in the kitchen dabbling as a pastry chef assistant with Montecito Confections - creating wedding cakes and desserts for a celebrity clientele.  A few years later, I worked with the LA Times profiling restaurants throughout LA County.  This led into creating PR and marketing campaigns for restaurants in Los Angeles.  Today, I work in the intersection of technology and food working with startups to promote their brands.

authors.headline: Fractional CMO/Head of Marketing/Head of PR and AR/Senior Consultant-with Successful Exits for VCs and Startups

profile_positions.description:
As a consultant, I work with global companies, PR and marketing agencies to supplement and support their efforts to develop comprehensive marketing communications programs and strategies that help grow businesses, taking them to the next level (strategic partnerships, M&A, IPO) or simply generate awareness in the marketplace.  

We have a unique understanding on how to leverage today's 24/7 newsrooms,  the media business landscape/models and how all mediums work together (online, print and broadcast) to get your message across.

CLIENTS INCLUDE (but not limited to): ad tech, enterprise, cloud, cybersecurity, hyperscaler, SD-WAN, SDN, HR technology, labor law, martech, sustainable technologies, telecom, data centers, IT security, mobile tech, networking, B2C QSR/fast casual restaurant technologies and fintech (back-end and front-end trading). Interested in past clients, case studies and testimonials? Just ask!

SAMPLING OF SERVICES
-Develop end-to-end internal and external communications strategies and programs.
-Work with media and analysts to create critical dialogues between clients, journalists and analysts utilizing traditional and digital strategies.
-Develop and lead media and influencer strategies for clients and agencies.
-Oversee the development and management of integrated communications programs to help increase brand relevance and awareness.
-Successfully achieved client goals of M&As due to the work produced in security, back-end trading technology and optical SDN technology.

Additional to the above, Jennifer's team provides:
-Brand identity
-Content development and marketing
-Event support 
-Support for sales to integrate marketing efforts
-Website design
